Package org.edg.data.replication.optorsim

Interface Summary
AccessPatternGenerator This interface must be implemented by all Access Pattern Generators.
ResourceBroker The ResourceBroker runs a thread which submits jobs to the Computing Elements.
Users The Users interface represents the human users of the Grid who submit jobs to it.
 

Class Summary
AccessCostResourceBroker Selects the Computing Elements on which to run jobs according to the access cost (estimated time to get all files for the current job) at the CE in question.
AccessPatternGeneratorFactory Used to obtain the type of Access Pattern Generator specified in the user parameters.
BatchComputingElement  
CEDataThread This class creates the computing element instance thread which shall source statistical values at regular intervals in real time from the computing elements statistics object.
CMSDC04Users This class models the user patterns for analysis during the CMS Data Challenege 2004 which ran from March to May.
CombinedCostResourceBroker This class is an implementation of the ResourceBroker which selects sites on which to run jobs according to the "queue access cost" -estimated time to get all files for the current job + to get all files for all jobs in the queue at the CE in question.
ComputingElementFactory  
GridConfFileReader This class provides a method to read the grid configuration file and build a route map, for the site to site connections.
GridDataThread This class creates the grid instance thread which shall source statistical values at regular intervals in real time from the statistics objects of each of the elements present on this grid.
JobHandler This class controls the flow of jobs into a ComputingElement using a queueing system.
OptorSimGUI This class sets up the OptorSim GUI, which contains components that facilitate user interaction and display various statistical information.
OptorSimMain Sets up the simulation and starts the threads.
OptorSimOut Prints output to screen and/or GUI as required.
QueueLengthResourceBroker Selects the Computing Elements on which to run jobs according to the queue length at each one.
RandomAccessGenerator This access pattern generator selects files at random from the list in the GridJob.
RandomCEResourceBroker Schedules the GridJob to any random Computing Element that will accept it.
RandomWaitUsers These users sleep for a random length of time between 0 and (2 * the job delay) milliseconds between submitting jobs.
RandomWalkGaussianAccessGenerator This class selects a file based on a Gaussian random walk: the sigma of which is set as half the number of files in the set.
RandomWalkUnitaryAccessGenerator This class selects a file based on a unitary random walk.
RandomZipfAccessGenerator This class selects files using Zipf-like distribution.
ResourceBrokerFactory Factory method for generating a ResourceBroker, based on user requirements.
SEDataThread This class creates the storage element instance thread which shall source statistical values at regular intervals in real time from the storage elements statistics object.
SequentialAccessGenerator This class is the most basic AccessPatternGenerator, it just hands the files back in the order they are in the configuration file, starting with the first one.
SequentialRandomEntryAccessGenerator This class is very similar to SequentialAccessGenerator.
SimpleComputingElement The ComputingElement runs a thread which executes the GridJobs given to it through its JobHandler.
SimpleUsers SimpleUsers sleep for a set length of time defined in the parameters file.
SiteDataThread This class creates the site instance thread which shall source statistical values at regular intervals in real time from the statistics objects of each of the elements present at this site.
SkelResourceBroker Provides all of the functionality required by all the Resource Brokers apart from the findCE() method which must be defined by each subclass.
TimeThread This class creates the TimeThread instance thread which shall source the grid (or simulation) time at regular intervals in real (or system) time from the gridTime instance.
UsersFactory Used to get the required group of users specified in the parameters file.
WNShutdown  
WorkerNode Worker node class for BatchComputingElement.
